comments.body: Those guys increased the hostel fee by 15k and, now we are served chicken just once, as opposed to thrice last academic year. Shame.
Non veg or Veg biryani, icecream , burger ,sometimes panipuri , kheer
Lmaoooo don't keep much hope though :)
Damn this is sad we used to get non veg almost everyday on rr campus food court is it still the same now?

lol just so uk those different names like fulka naam roti whatever is just one thing  
burger is bun with a cutlet in the middle  
biriyani is alright  
all curries taste the same , just diff vegetables egg or paneer in it  
pani puri may contain worms , beware.  
good luck
